wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Appleby (or Thomas de Appleby) was a Bishop of Carlisle. He was elected after 18 January 1363, and consecrated 18 June 1363. He died on 5 December 1395.

response: *Thomas Appleby, Roger de Clifford, 5th Baron de Clifford and others (1370–) (jointly)
*Thomas Appleby (composer) (c. 1488–1563), English Renaissance composer and church musician
